column4: how do I fix: *** 'pkg-config --modversion glib-2.0' returned 2.8.6, but GLIB (2.8.3)
The -dev version of normal package versions are mismatched?
Just upgrade one or downgrade the other.
how do i downgrade? uninstall the newest version
Did you at some stage do a manual or custom upgrade?
Ok, easiest would be to downgrade it, 'sudo apt-get install libglib2.0-0=2.8.3-0ubuntu1'
it says: libglib2.0-0 is already the newest version.
i don't think its -dev i think it's the actual glib-2.0
i re-installed it but it's still mismatched
i might need to manually uninstall 2.8.6
